meanings.definition: To point out or show something
meanings.sent1: The arrow indicates the direction to go.
meanings.sent2: Her finger indicates the correct answer on the map.
meanings.sent3: The flashing neon sign indicates the best place to eat in town.
meanings.sent4: The rising sun indicates the start of a new day.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's smile indicates approval of your work.

meanings.sent1: His tone of voice indicates he is not happy.
meanings.sent2: The dark clouds indicate that it might rain soon.
meanings.sent3: The empty cookie jar indicates someone has been snacking.
meanings.sent4: The loud music indicates there is a party next door.
meanings.sent5: The long line at the store indicates a sale is happening.

meanings.definition: To serve as a sign or signal of something
meanings.sent1: The red light indicates it is not safe to cross the street.
meanings.sent2: The sudden drop in temperature indicates winter is coming.
meanings.sent3: The loud roar of the crowd indicates a goal has been scored.
meanings.sent4: The chirping of birds indicates the arrival of spring.
meanings.sent5: The ringing phone indicates someone is calling.
